remarks: Class substitution in an image set.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Dec-2016.)
statement:
elabreximdv.1 $e |- ( A = B -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
elabreximdv.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
elabreximdv.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. C ) -> ps ) $.
elabreximdv $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. { y | E. x e. C y = B } ) -> ch ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
